titles: A proclamation against breakinge or defacing of monumentes of antiquitie, beyng set up in churches or other publique places for memory and not for supersticion
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

place: Imprinted at London in Powles Churcheyarde :
publisher: By Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: "Geuen at Windsor the xix. of September, the seconde yeare of her Maiesties raygne."
